name: Cool Steel
r1: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 12%.
r2: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 15%.
r3: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 18%.
r4: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 21%.
r5: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Cryo by 24%.
